name: CSSStyleRule.selectorText
description: The CSSRule.selectorText property gets the textual representation of the selector for the rule set. This is readonly in some browsers; to set stylesheet rules dynamically cross-browser, see Using dynamic styling information.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSStyleRule.selectorText' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM)' specification.
